answers.answer: I got induced with my second child i went in at 5:30 am and they hook u up with iv and monitors to monitor the baby and they usaully do that for a half an hour b4 they induce u but my son was moving tomuch and they had to keep fixing the monitor but at 6:30 they finally induced my i started to have real strong contractions at 7:30 and had my son at 4:38 pm i was only. 1 cm wen i went in and about 50% thined and it don't matter how thin u are or how dialated u are it depeands on the women and pregnancy it could happen in like 3 hours u never no :) good luck to u :)

I was supposed to have my cervix ripened but when I got there my doctor decided to just do pitocin. I ended up in an emergency c section. Never dilated past a 2 and when I got the epidural her heart rate plummeted

I guess it just all depends on the dr and everything. Because with my first child they were going to give me a pill vaginaly to help dialate and induce me the next morning. Well the pill they gave me kick started my labor and I had her 6 hrs later. I had the Iv for pain and the epidural. So that one was a breeze for me. Well with my son I was dilated at 2 for a week so we decided to induce. I went in and they gave me the potocin and I was hooked up to monitors. The potocin made contractions closer together and stronger. But my labor only lasted an hr. I didn't get a chance for any meds because I dilated from 3 to 10 with in the 15 mins that I was waiting for my epidural so that one hurt more then first lol. But this time I'm gonna try to do no meds again. See how that goes. I'm super nervouse though because how fast my last delivery was. Lol but that's all I went through.

Well she said its possible ill have to have a c section which im not scared of. but how did you get induced? i know theres capsules and gel they can use. my ob didnt specify how she was going to induce me. i opted to get induced bc shes gonna be on vacation and wont be back until im almost 43 weeks and i dont wanna wait that long. plus i dont have preeclampsia but my bp has been high. i guess im just hoping to get peace of mind that it wont take almost 2 days to have my baby.
I received the pitocin thru an Iv drip
My hospitals policy is an iv is automatically hooked up in case of complications

What my doctor told me was they put a pill in the vagina at 8pm which is the time I'm suppose to go in then another pill at 2 am then pitocin at 7 am. So he said I will be having her until the next day.
Oh so they wait every 6 hrs to do things.

Not my doctor my first I went in at a 0 and they started everything and epidural when I was a 3 and a hour later I was ready to push. I was in labor for 7 hours it went pretty quick and smooth ever woman is different every doctor is different.

question: I posted earlier about being excited about my induction on monday. well the more i think about it the more anxious and scared i become. Ive been at 1cm for the past month so my ob said trying to ripen my cervix and dialating more will take the longest. she said ill go in monday at 5am but i probably wouldnt have her until tuesday sometime. it scares me a little bit. i was just wonderinh what yalls thoughts were and experiences with induction.
title: what happens durin induction?
